  • Uses of TourOptions in org.vaadin.addons.de.f0rce.shepherd.config.tour

    Methods in org.vaadin.addons.de.f0rce.shepherd.config.tour that return TourOptions 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    TourOptions TourOptions.classPrefix​(java.lang.String classPrefix)
    The prefix to add to the shepherd-enabled and shepherd-target class names as well as the data-shepherd-step-id.
    TourOptions TourOptions.confirmCancel​(boolean confirmCancel)
    If true, will issue a window.confirm before cancelling.
    TourOptions TourOptions.confirmCancelMessage​(java.lang.String confirmCancelMessage)
    The message to display in the confirm dialog.
    TourOptions TourOptions.defaultStepOptions​(StepOptions defaultStepOptions)
    Default options for Step's, created through Step(StepOptions) or Tour.addStep(StepOptions).
    TourOptions TourOptions.exitOnEsc​(boolean exitOnEsc)
    Exiting the tour with the escape key will be enabled unless this is explicitly set to false.
    TourOptions TourOptions.keyboardNavigation​(boolean keyboardNavigation)
    Navigating the tour via left and right arrow keys will be enabled unless this is explicitly set to false.
    TourOptions TourOptions.tourName​(java.lang.String tourName)
    An optional "name" for the tour.
    TourOptions TourOptions.useModalOverlay​(boolean useModalOverlay)
    Whether or not steps should be placed above a darkened modal overlay.
